text: Édouard Molinaro (13 May 1928 – 7 December 2013) was a French movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Bordeaux, Gironde. He was nominated for an Academy Award. Molinaro was known for his movies Mon oncle Benjamin and La Cage aux Folles. Molinaro died on 7 December 2013 in Paris. His cause of death was of a long-illness. He was 85 years old.Mort d’Édouard Molinaro, artisan indispensable du cinéma français ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2013 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie actors Category:Writers from Bordeaux
title: Édouard Molinaro
